name: Banana Pudding
steps: In a medium saucepan, whisk together sugar, flour, and salt.
Gradually whisk in milk and egg yolks.
Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly, until mixture thickens.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
In a 9x13 inch dish, layer vanilla wafers, sliced bananas, and pudding.
Repeat layers until all ingredients are used.
In a large bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Spread whipped cream over the top of the pudding.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
